name: Falchion of Doom
description: A sword that glows hellish red, it is said to be forged by the Deathknights themselves, the blade and the handle are decorated by the bones of their enemies.
tooltip: You gain 15% critical chance while wielding this weapon.
You gain 10% block chance while wielding this weapon.
You gain +2 STR while wielding this weapon.
You take 15% less darkness damage while wielding this weapon.
Double Slash (40%): Deals 2-12 + 5 * STR bonus slashing damage and 2-8 + 5 * CHA/INT bonus darkness damage.
Big Slash (40%): Deals 2-12 + 5 * STR bonus slashing damage and 1-8 + 5 * CHA/INT bonus darkness damage. This attack has a +10% critical chance.
Shadow Slashes (20%): Deals 9-20 + 5 * STR bonus slashing damage and 12-16 + 5 * CHA/INT bonus darkness damage. This attack has a +5% critical chance.
